document_data.mainbody:
yanna Orgolath was a human lover of the demon lord Grazzt whose affections would eventually birth the Orgolath Dynasty of Nentyarch rulers in Narfell.
In , Ayanna gave birth to twin boys who were the half-fiend offspring of Grazzt. The brothers, named Ulthas and Ulthar, were nicknamed "the Darkwing" and "the Darkhorn" respectively because of their demonic heritage. The twins would slay Nentyarch Belevan the Unliving of the Crell Dynasty in , thus beginning the Orgolath Dynasty which would last for nearly 500 years.
